title: Support multi-factor authentication options
description: As a customer, I want multi-factor authentication options, so that I can secure my account with a second layer of security.
attributes_and_rules: Support OTP via SMS, email, or authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria: MFA should work with OTP sent via SMS, Email, or authenticator apps.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they enable MFA, then they should receive OTP via the selected method.

title: Establish password policies
description: As a system administrator, I want to establish password policies, so that user accounts are protected against weak passwords.
attributes_and_rules: Password policies must include complexity requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Passwords must include at least 8 characters, a number, an uppercase letter, and a special character.
test_cases: Given a user, when they create a password, then it should meet the stated complexity requirements.

title: Implement session management
description: As a customer, I want secure session management, so that my sessions remain protected.
attributes_and_rules: Sessions should automatically expire after a set time period.
acceptance_criteria: Sessions should expire after 30 minutes of inactivity.
test_cases: Given an inactive session, when 30 minutes have passed, then the session should be automatically terminated.

title: Account lockout feature
description: As a security officer, I want account lockout features, so that repeated failed login attempts are mitigated.
attributes_and_rules: Accounts should lock after 5 failed login attempts within 15 minutes.
acceptance_criteria: Accounts should lock after 5 consecutive failed login attempts.
test_cases: Given multiple failed login attempts, when the threshold is reached, then the account should be locked.

title: Integrate with identity management services
description: As a system integrator, I want to integrate the authentication system with identity management services, so that it aligns with our existing infrastructure.
attributes_and_rules: The authentication system must seamlessly integrate with existing identity management services.
acceptance_criteria: The system should authenticate users through the integrated identity management service.
test_cases: Given a user, when they log in, then the system should authenticate using the integrated identity management service.

title: Display customer-specific account summaries
description: As a customer, I want to see a summary of my accounts and balances, so that I can quickly understand my financial status.
attributes_and_rules: Show account summaries and balances on the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display account summaries and balances specific to the customer.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they access the dashboard, then they should see their account summaries and balances.

title: Recommend products and services
description: As a customer, I want personalized product and service recommendations, so that I can find relevant banking options.
attributes_and_rules: Recommendations should be based on customer behavior, preferences, and eligibility data.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should intelligently recommend products/services based on the customer profile.
test_cases: Given a customer's profile, when they visit the dashboard, then personalized recommendations should be displayed.

title: Provide quick actions for essential functions
description: As a customer, I want quick access to functions like viewing transactions, submitting requests, and reviewing notifications, so that I can easily manage my banking activities.
attributes_and_rules: Include quick links to view transaction history, submit requests, and review notifications.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should have quick action links for essential functions.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they access the dashboard, then they should find quick links to essential functions.

title: Develop a responsive front-end
description: As a user, I want a responsive front-end, so that I can access the portal on any device without usability issues.
attributes_and_rules: The front-end should be adaptive and accessible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: The front-end must be usable on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
test_cases: Given any device, when accessing the portal, then the front-end should be responsive and functional.

title: Ensure compliance with WCAG 2.1
description: As an accessibility advocate, I want the portal to comply with WCAG 2.1, so that it is accessible to users with disabilities.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure all elements meet WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.
acceptance_criteria: The portal must be compliant with WCAG 2.1.
test_cases: Given users with disabilities, when accessing the portal, then they should find it meets WCAG 2.1 standards.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement guided workflows for account openings
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for account openings, so that I can easily open new accounts online.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows should guide through steps with form validation and real-time eligibility checks.
acceptance_criteria: The workflows should guide the user through all steps of account openings.
test_cases: Given a user, when they begin opening an account, then they should be guided step-by-step.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Simplify service modification requests
description: As a customer, I want simplified service modification requests, so that I can easily update my banking services.
attributes_and_rules: Include minimal interactions and ensure compliance with KYC and AML.
acceptance_criteria: The workflows should simplify service modification requests.
test_cases: Given a customer, when requesting service modifications, then the process should be simplified and compliant with regulations.

title: Implement secure document upload functionality
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload documents, so that I can submit required documentation online.
attributes_and_rules: Support image and PDF formats with antivirus scanning and encryption.
acceptance_criteria: The system should support secure uploading of documents in image and PDF formats.
test_cases: Given a user, when uploading documents, then they should be scanned, encrypted, and securely uploaded.

title: Save and resume incomplete applications
description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later without losing data.
attributes_and_rules: Allow saving intermediate data securely with version control.
acceptance_criteria: Partially completed applications should be stored securely and resumable from any device.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when saving, then it should be securely stored and later resumable.

title: Enable real-time status tracking for requests
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real time, so that I am aware of their progress.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should show real-time status updates for customer requests.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to track request statuses in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer request, when it progresses, then the customer should see real-time updates in their dashboard.

title: Integrate automated email and SMS notifications
description: As a customer, I want automated notifications via email and SMS, so that I receive timely updates about my request statuses.
attributes_and_rules: Send notifications when actions are required, request stages advance, or upon completion.
acceptance_criteria: Email and SMS notifications should be sent for status updates.
test_cases: Given a request status change, when it occurs, then the customer should receive an email or SMS notification.

title: Record user interactions for audit
description: As a security officer, I want to record user interactions, so that an auditable log of portal activities is maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Capture logins, form submissions, document uploads, and request changes.
acceptance_criteria: All user interactions should be recorded and maintained in an audit log.
test_cases: Given a user interaction, when it occurs, then it should be captured in the audit log.

title: Develop secure integration layer with the core banking system
description: As a system integrator, I want a secure integration layer with the core banking system, so that real-time data synchronization is maintained.
acceptance_criteria: The integration layer should securely exchange data in real time with the core banking system.
test_cases: Given a transaction, when it occurs, then the integration layer should handle real-time data exchange securely.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As a system administrator, I want to implement role-based access control, so that users only access permitted features.
attributes_and_rules: Assign feature visibility and permissions according to predefined roles.
acceptance_criteria: The system should enforce role-based access controls consistently.
test_cases: Given a user, when assigned a role, then accesses should be controlled based on their role.
